full_summary:
================

# Colliery No. 7 Stabilization

## Project Details

*   **Tender Reference Number**: WS3754529710-Doc3754551499
*   **Amendment Number**: 2
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS3754529710
*   **Publication Date**: November 18, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: December 13, 2022, 2:00 PM (EST)

## Project Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is soliciting bids to stabilize colliery #7 in Glace Bay, Nova Scotia. It is essential to note that all submissions must be received by December 13, 2022, at 2:00 PM (EST). Any submissions received after this time will be considered non-conformist.

The winning bidder will have twenty weeks from the date of contract award to complete the project.

**Important Project Details**

*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Deliverables**: Stabilization of Colliery #7
*   **Bid Security**: Required
*   **Delivery Location**: Glace Bay, Nova Scotia

## Tender Documents

For a complete tender package, please visit [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14676033?extsite=MTQ2NzYwMzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14676033?extsite=MTQ2NzYwMzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

**Contact Information**

Adam Beaumaster (SPAC/PSPC)
**Email**: adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
